articles.content: New York, July 22 (IANS) Even as global temperatures are reaching record highs, US space agency NASA aims to keep a track and find possible solutions to climate change.From wildfires, flooding, heatw… [+1740 chars]

articles.author: Vikrant Singh
articles.title: 7 Unsolved Mysteries About Solar System - WION
articles.description: Here are some of the most enigmatic phenomena in our solar system but we humans have so far failed to understand the science behind them.
articles.content: Mercury, the smallest planet, and Ganymede, one of Jupiters moons, both exhibit unexpectedly strong magnetic fields. Ascertaining the sources of these magnetic fields still challenges our current und… [+34 chars]
